    • Method Detail

      • findPeriodForCurrentDay

        static int findPeriodForCurrentDay(org.json.JSONArray jsonPeriodsArray)
        Looks if there is a period for the current week day
        Parameters:
        jsonPeriodsArray - periods for the store
        Returns:
        index of store period for current day if it found one; else -1
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • generateDateFromPeriods

        static java.util.Date generateDateFromPeriods(org.json.JSONObject jsonPeriodObject,
                                              boolean closingTime)
        Generates java Date object from jsonPeriodObject delivered by backend
        Parameters:
        jsonPeriodObject - JsonObject containing period information for current day
        closingTime - boolean value to indicate if current date shall represent closing or opening time
        Returns:
        date if closingTime --> closingDate; else openingDate
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getTimeDifference

        public static int getTimeDifference(java.util.Date date1,
                                    java.util.Date date2)
        Calculates the difference between to dates
        Parameters:
        date1 - date1 is the comparing date
        date2 - date2 is the date date1 is compared to
        Returns:
        difference Difference between two dates in hours
        Since:
        1.0.0
